org.smartfrog.sfcore.common
Class TerminatorThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.smartfrog.sfcore.utils.SmartFrogThread
          org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.TerminatorThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Executable
public class TerminatorThread
extends SmartFrogThread

TerminatorThread is used by components for asynchronous termination. Caller component should create the object and then call method start() to start this thread. Example: 

       TerminatorThread terminator = new TerminatorThread(targetComponent,
              excp, componentId).quietly();
       // start the thead
       terminator.start();
It can also be used for synchronous termination in a background thread, in which case the SmartFrogThread.run() method can be called directly. That method has error handling and logging that it is hard to justyf
